          <title>
            <string language="es">Un juego de simulación del movimiento acelerado</string>
            <string language="en">A game which simulates accelerated motions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spiel, das beschleunigte Bewegungen 
simuliert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un jeu qui simule des mouvements accélérés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um jogo que simule movimentos acelerados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un gioco che simula i movimenti accelerati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα παιχνίδι που μιμείται τις επιταχυνόμενες κινήσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">simulación interactiva que muestra una carrera entre dos jugadores para pretender mostrar el significado del movimiento acelerado</string>
            <string language="en">interactive simulation which shows a race between two players in order to explain the meaning of accelerated movement</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">carrera</string>
            <string language="en">race</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">movimiento</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">acelerado</string>
            <string language="en">accelerated</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">vectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Simulation, die ein Rennen zwischen 
zwei Spielern zeigt, um die Bedeutung der beschleunigten Bewegung zu 
erklären</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">simulation interactive qui montre que une course 
entre deux joueurs expliquait la signification du mouvement 
accéléré</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">simulação interativa que mostra uma raça entre
dois jogadores a fim explicar o meaning do movimento acelerado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">simulazione interattiva che mostra una corsa fra 
due giocatori per spiegare il significato del movimento accelerato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική προσομοίωση που εμφανίζει έναν αγώνα 
ταχύτητας μεταξύ δύο φορέων προκειμένου να εξηγηθεί η έννοια 
της επιταχυνόμενης μετακίνησης</string>
          </description>
